title: Gridded time series data manipulation and analysis
text: Management gridded time-series (arrays time dimension), normally geographical (longitude, latitude, depth/altitude). package provides methods read write gridded time-series (GTS) objects manage using R time-series methods. See https://roliveros-ramos.github.io/gts/ details.
